title: Flight to Flinders
creator_credit: Tasmanian State Film Unit, Ray Barnes and Peter Young
brief_description: A brief tour of Flinders Island, Bass strait, showing its natural features, birds, and points of interest to visitors. Includes a good historical commentary, with some emphasis on the work done by early artists painting flora and fauna.
creator_credit_for_label: Tasmanian State Film Unit, Ray Barnes and Peter Young
